name: Luna Moon
message: Hi! I am Luna. I am from Finland. Today I am very busy with my work. After finishing my work, I will go to a shop for buying my dress.

name: John Nobel
message: Hi! I am John. I am from England. Today I am very busy with my work. After finishing my work, I will go to school to bring back my son.

name: Fionna Daisy
message: Hi! I am Feonna. I am from Netherland. Today I am very busy with my work. After finishing my work, I will go to a showroom for buying my new car.

name: Robert Hogue
message: Hi! I am Robert. I am from Treland. Today I am very busy with my work. After finishing my work, I will meet with my girlfriend.
